level.heading: AUTHORIZATION FOR DISINTERMENT AND REINTERMENT (ยง 29-2813)

level.text: An authorization for disinterment and reinterment of a dead body shall be issued by the Registrar upon receipt of an application which meets the requirements of ยง 2813.2 or upon receipt of an order of a D.C. Court directing the action.
An application for disinterment and reinterment shall be:
Signed by the next of kin or legal representative of the deceased and by the person who is in charge of the disinterment; and
Approved by the Director of the Department of Health.
The application shall specify the place of disinterment and reinterment.
A dead body properly prepared by an embalmer and deposited in a receiving vault shall not be considered a disinterment when removed from the vault for final disposition.
